artist: Artist: Akseli Gallen-Kallela; Editor: Compiled by Elias Lönnrot , from national folklore; Publisher: Werner Söderström
description: Head and tail pieces, initials in red and black. Pagination in red. Marginal notes. Title and imprint distributed on two leaves illustrated in colors. Title and text within gray single line border. Binding: vellum with gold decoration on spine; endpapers: decorative design in brown
medium: Woodblock illustrations and initials in black and red; letterpress
title: Kalevala
